ECHO GECHO QECHO SEND
Usage: echo <message> gecho <message> send <victim> <message> qecho <message>
ECHO displays a string to everyone in your room. GECHO displays the string to everyone in the game. QECHO displays the string to everyone with the QUEST flag. SEND displays the string to a particular person.
Examples:
> echo Hi, everyone in the room. > gecho Hi, everyone in the game, isn't this annoying? > send rasmussen You are being watched.
